page.title: 06LIVING IN WHARTON ST. 1985
page.content: My name is Mark,I live in an old terraced house with my younger brother Shaun and my mam and dad.We live in {Wharton Street.}It is two flats ,a lot of the houses in this part of Shields are,or were,flats.It is in a long,old street with a cemetery at the dead end.The streets look alike and trees & playareas are being created.The Town Hall is near.I call it 'Little Ben'. There are 2 parks,the town centre &the beach.There is lots to do.I can walk to the library and the new{Denmark } { Shopping Centre.}We saw Prince George of Denmark open it. Across the road to my school (St.Bede's) is Lipton House where my mam works as a clerk.My dad works at Streamline Garages. This summer we are moving to a {brand new house in Laygate,}with a garden at the front and back.
